channel.title: The Disco Wobble- Breezymode [Electronic/Dance]
channel.description:
Hello fellow bassheads
I have had Auxy for a few months now and I just completed my first complete track. I have been tweaking it for a little bit now and it is finally ready to be heard. I know i still have a lot to learn but i wouldn't post this online if i didnt know that i have something here. Any help and feedback that you can provide will be beyond helpful for me as i continue to learn and grow as an artist. But enough boring ish.... turn your bass up and get ready for The Disco Wobble ! You can find me on soundcloud through the link attached @Breezymode
Like and repost and i will check out your pages too!
https://soundcloud.com/breezymode/the-disco-wobble

item.title: The Disco Wobble- Breezymode [Electronic/Dance]
item.dc:creator: Breezymode
item.description:
Hey guys I posted my first track on Saturday and the response was incredible! The Auxy community is seriously amazing. I feel like there is some potential for a remix here and definitely room for improvement.

Let me know if you think you could remix this I would love to collab!

https://soundcloud.com/breezymode/the-disco-wobble

Read full topic

item.title: The Disco Wobble- Breezymode [Electronic/Dance]
item.dc:creator: Breezymode
item.description:
@INDIR3CT thank you!! It is wild how different the first version of this song was and how it has evolved from there. Also I am loving the Auxy community so far it seems like everyone is really supportive and eager to share and make everyones content better! I like these ideas!

Read full topic

item.title: The Disco Wobble- Breezymode [Electronic/Dance]
item.dc:creator: INDIR3CT
item.description:
Hey there and welcome to the Auxy Disco! Glad to see some new faces around here! Congratulations on posting your first official track. I totatlly love the effect and transition into the Trap Drop at 2:05! Keep it up! The only thing I would change is to have more snares/claps after the second drop at 2:40. But hey that’s just me

Congrats and keep it up!

Read full topic
